summary.span: 确定应用程序是否具有调用非托管代码的权限。

span.span: Determines whether the application has permission to call unmanaged code.

span.span: A Boolean value indicating whether the application has permission to call unmanaged code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks "应用程序" 是指要为其读取清单的应用程序。"Application" refers to the application for which the manifest is being read. 您可以使用或读取部署清单 。You can read the deployment manifest using or .

summary.span: 确定在设置完全信任标志时是否保留部分信任权限。

span.span: Determines whether to preserve partial trust permission when the full trust flag is set.

summary.span: 如果在指定完全信任的情况下此选项为 false，则在保存时将删除权限集对象中定义的所有权限。

span.span: If this option is false with full trust specified, then any permissions defined in the permission set object will be dropped on save.

value.span: 指示设置完全信任标志后是否保留部分信任权限的布尔值。

span.span: A Boolean value indicating whether to preserve partial trust permission when the full trust flag is set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常 ，当设置为时 `True` ，将删除所有权限设置。Normally when is set to `True`, all permission settings are deleted. 如果要在设计时) 中保留这些设置 (通常，可以调用此方法来持久保存权限设置，即使在 设置为时也是如此 `True` 。If you want to preserve these settings (typically during design time), you can call this method to persist the permission settings even when is set to `True`. `PreserveFullTrustPermissionSet` 不应将设置为以 `True` 进行 clickonce 部署，因为这违反了 clickonce 架构要求。`PreserveFullTrustPermissionSet` should not be set to `True` for ClickOnce deployments because this violates ClickOnce schema requirements. 如果将此属性设置为 `False` 且指定了完全信任，则在保存时将删除权限集对象中定义的所有权限。If this property is set to `False` with full trust specified, then any permissions defined in the permission set object will be dropped on save.

summary.span: 描述允许的“同一站点”访问级别，该级别指定应用程序是否具有与部署它的服务器进行通信的权限。

span.span: Describes the level of "same site" access permitted, specifying whether the application has permission to communicate with the server from which it was deployed.

value.span: 指示允许的同一站点访问级别的字符串。

span.span: A string indicating the level of same site access permitted.
The values can be or .

value.span: 指定应用程序可以在部署它的同一个 URL 上调用 Web 服务；如果是从共享部署的，则应用程序有权从该共享读取文件。

span.span: specifies that the application can call Web services at the same URL from which it was deployed; if deployed from a share, the application has permission to read files from that share.

value.span: 指定应用程序既不能从部署它的同一个 URL 访问 Web 服务，也不能从部署它的共享访问文件。

span.span: specifies that the application can neither access Web services from the same URL from which it was deployed, nor access files from the share from which it was deployed.

value.span: “应用程序”指的是为其读取清单（使用 ）的应用程序。

span.span: "Application" refers to the application for which the manifest is being read (using ).

remarks.format: ## Remarks "应用程序" 是指要为其读取清单的应用程序。"Application" refers to the application for which the manifest is being read. 您可以使用或读取部署清单 。You can read the deployment manifest using or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅更新 \ 文件中包含节的部分 \ ，而不更新其他任何内容。This method updates only the \ section in a file containing only the \ section and nothing else. 指定的流只能包含 \ 节，不能包含其他数据。The specified stream must contain only a \ section and no other data.

summary.span: 将应用程序信任写入新的模板 ClickOnce 应用程序清单。

span.span: Writes the application trust to a new template ClickOnce application manifest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅更新 \ 文件中只包含顶级清单标头、 \ 节和其他内容的部分。This method updates only the \ section in a file containing only the top-level manifest header, the \ section, and nothing else.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void WriteManifest(string path) cil managed

span.span: The name of the output file.

summary.span: 将应用程序信任写入 ClickOnce 应用程序清单。

span.span: Writes the application trust to a ClickOnce application manifest.

summary.span: 如果文件存在，则将更新“信任”部分。

span.span: If the file exists, the trust section will be updated.

summary.span: 如果该文件不存在，则将创建具有指定信任的新模板清单。

span.span: If the file does not exist, a new template manifest with the specified trust will be created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅更新 \ 文件中只包含顶级清单标头、 \ 节和其他内容的部分。This method updates only the \ section in a file containing only the top-level manifest header, the \ section, and nothing else. 此方法的重载将就地更新文件 (即，输入文件与输出文件) 相同。This overload of the method will update the file in place (that is, the input file is the same as the output file). 如果文件存在，则将更新“信任”部分。If the file exists, the trust section will be updated. 如果该文件不存在，则将创建具有指定信任的新模板清单。If the file does not exist, a new template manifest with the specified trust will be created.

MemberSignature.Value: public void WriteManifest (System.IO.Stream input, System.IO.Stream output);
.method public hidebysig instance void WriteManifest(class System.IO.Stream input, class System.IO.Stream output) cil managed
Public Sub WriteManifest (input As Stream, output As Stream)
public: void WriteManifest(System::IO::Stream ^ input, System::IO::Stream ^ output);

span.span: Specifies an input stream.
Specifies an output stream.

summary.span: 更新具有指定信任度的现有 ClickOnce 应用程序清单。

span.span: Updates an existing ClickOnce application manifest with the specified trust.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅更新 \ 文件中只包含顶级清单标头、 \ 节和其他内容的部分。This method updates only the \ section in a file containing only the top-level manifest header, the \ section, and nothing else.
